sentences.sentence: You need to deploy your distributable Web applications to every node.
sentences.translation: 您需要将可分布的Web应用程序部署到每一个节点。

sentences.sentence: They do not replicate distributable Web applications to other nodes in the cluster.
sentences.translation: 它们不会将可分布的Web应用程序复制到集群中的其他节点。

sentences.sentence: NET Framework, you can participate in building the distributable rich client of the future.
sentences.translation: NET框架的到来，您可以参与建立未来可分发的富客户端。
